content: a simple change to the cuff stitches of these mittens gives the pair a little creative detail to coordinate with the easy twisted rib beanie 1 these are a great first time mitten knit in the round choose your two favorite colors and make these mismatching mittens for everyone you know **sizes ** small medium large **to fit hand circumferences ** 6 5 7 5 8 5 / 16 5 19 21 5 cm measured around widest part of knuckles **yarn ** ewe ewe yarns heather s heathers 2 95 yards per 50g skein 100% merino wool superwash yarn #4 worsted weight * color a - 1 skein 30 saffron * color b - 1 skein 70 aquamarine get the yarn to make this project see easy twisted rib mittens yarn kit > 3 **needles ** us 7 4 5 mm double-pointed knitting needles **supplies ** 3 stitch markers tapestry needle row counter optional **gauge ** 20 sts to 4 / 10 cm in stockinette stitch and after light blocking knit the matching hat see the easy twisted rib beanie > 4 ------------------------------------------------- find the ewe ewe yarn to make this project local stockists and sign up for our newsletter 5 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/easy-twisted-rib-beanie 2 https //www ravelry com/yarns/library/ewe-ewe-yarns-heathers-heathers 3 https //eweewe com/products/copy-of-easy-twisted-rib-beanie-yarn-knitting-kit 4 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/easy-twisted-rib-beanie 5 https //www eweewe com
